name: Organization of district
text: §180-8  Organization of district.  To complete the organization of the district, the department of land and natural resources shall present to the lieutenant governor a statement setting out the name of the district and its boundaries, and certifying that the procedures prescribed in this chapter for the organization of a district have been fully complied with in organizing this district.  The statement shall request the lieutenant governor to issue a certificate of organization to the district.  The lieutenant governor shall record the statement in the lieutenant governor's office and shall issue to the directors of the district a certificate, under the seal of the State, of the due organization of the district. [L 1947, c 191, pt of §5; RL 1955, §28-11; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §§9, 22; am L 1961, c 132, §2; am L 1967, c 145, §§1, 2; HRS §180-8; gen ch 1985]
